page.title: 15E.Horsley S. Garden Centre
page.content: This busy Garden Centre & Nursery is on the main East/West road. It covers 21 acres and employs an average of 14 people. During the Easter & Summer vacations university students are employed as additional help. Before World War II it was an orchard, now it comprises an office for tree surgeons, several large glasshouses for raising indoor plants and annual seedlings for sale to enthusiastic amateur garden- ers, together with shrubs and trees. A mobile van sells fresh fish on Fridays, & fruit & vegetables, includ- ing overseas fruit bought in, are on sale, potential customers being attra- cted by the display at the gate. Whilst this is mostly used by local people, it is in a good position to attract passing traffic. Gardening im- plements and seeds, and seasonal items such as Christmas trees are also sold.
